title: Hat Trick
description: Adele Knowles is just hired as the new event planner for the Boston Bears hockey team. Dominik Tomondi is the star defenseman and thinks he found his perfect match. As the sparks between them threaten to melt the ice around Adele's heart, will Dominik be able to convince her the past is the past and that her future is with him?
author: Caralyn Fox
